DOC.brief_title: Pregnancy Outcomes With GnRH Antagonist Protocol Versus GnRH-Agonist Protocol ICSI Cycles
DOC.detailed_description: 160 woman equally divide GnRH antagonist protocol ( Group 1 ) versus GnRH agonist protocol ( Group 2 ) ICSI cycle . The trial conduct September 2005 December 2006 . The mean age group 32 ( range 22-40 ) . The main outcome measure number oocytes retrieve , injected fertilize , embryos transfer , clinical pregnancy miscarriage rate .
DOC.criteria: Infertility couple , absence endometriosis ( confirm previous surgical procedure investigate infertility ) , polycystic ovarian syndrome , FSH level < 12 IU/l , basal level estradiol < 20 group submit agonist protocol begin stimulation day 2 group submit antagonist protocol , absence ovarian cyst endovaginal ultrasound use exogenous LH stimulation
